text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After hitching a ride with the<n>fisherman Hishi Akebono
befriended,<n>we finally set foot on this... accursed<n>island.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Mmm! That sun feels so good! The<n>perfect day for
seaweed harvesting!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
By the way... That's a lot of luggage,<n>Trainer! What exactly
did you bring?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
A bunch of water, a fire striker... Ah,<n>you even brought an
encyclopedia of<n>edible plants!
choice_data_list: Today will not end like last time.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I almost forgot how we met. I<n>found you collapsed in
this very area!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
That sure did surprise me. If you<n>hadn't woken up, I'm not
sure what I<n>would've done.
choice_data_list:
I thought a goddess had come to save me at
first.

I thought a goddess had come to save me at
first.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Oh, you charmer, you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if the goddess you saw is<n>as big as I am. I guess
I'll have to ask<n>around to see if anyone else has<n>spotted
a giant goddess.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, put down that stuff and...<n>let's get going! I wanna
harvest lots<n>and lots of kombu seaweed!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
The fisherman said we could grab<n>some fish while we're at
it! Trainer,<n>you guard our baskets so the birds<n>don't steal
anything!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono takes off for the<n>beaches, and I'm left in the
shade to<n>watch over our stuff. Before I know it,<n>two hours
have gone by...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Sorry for the wait!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I found some really big shellfish and<n>fish! With these, I can
make us some<n>lunch!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
That's what I brought this big earthen<n>pot for! I'm sure it'll
make it eeextra<n>good!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ah, no, Trainer, you can sit back and<n>relax! You must be
tired, right?<n>Keeping watch can really wear you<n>out.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Just wait a teeeensy bit longer. A<n>good, hearty meal will fix
you right up!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono quickly begins<n>preparing our lunch. Looks
like<n>there's nothing for me to do.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But I don't exactly want to just stand<n>around...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grabbing my encyclopedia of plants, I<n>make my way farther
into the island in<n>search of ingredients.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No matter how much I search, I can't<n>seem to find anything
edible...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I did happen upon some mushrooms,<n>but picking wild
mushrooms as an<n>amateur would be asking for trouble.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Traaainer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
There you are! Thank goodness!<n>What happened? Did you
get lost?
choice_data_list: No, I was looking for ingredients...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, wait, are you thathungry?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Well, don't you worry! I'm not just<n>making hot pot. I'm
making some<n>skewers and grilled fish too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: It's almost done, so just wait a liiiittle<n>bit longer, okay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A feast fit for a sumo wrestler is laid<n>out before me. Fish
and vegetable<n>skewers, hot pot... there's even rice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Every dish makes my taste buds sing<n>with joy. I know it's
far too much for<n>just the two of us, but my hands<n>won't
stop reaching for another<n>helping.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Was it good?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm glad you liked it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I love seeing you eat with that big<n>smile on your face. It
makes me feel<n>all warm and fuzzy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I sure am glad you became my<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
If you get hungry again, just let me<n>know, okay? I'll whip
up something in<n>a jiffy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono smiles as she gazes<n>at me, content with her
work. While<n>she seems to do it because she<n>enjoys it, I
can't help but want to<n>return the favor.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Right then and there, I decide to treat<n>her to some good food
at the next<n>opportunity.
